items.title: Web Dapps
items.markdown: With Parity 1.5 support for accessing web-based dapps are build right into the client. Accessing any dapp is as simple as visiting the dapp using the built-in browser.

items.title: User walk-through
items.markdown: We love our community. And we really love the feedback that we receive that feeds into our release process. Recently we stumbled accross a new user walk-though of our latest release, which we really liked, as did the community on Reddit. MrYukonC's Parity walk-though.

items.title: Parity 1.5
items.markdown: Packed with more features than ever before, the Parity 1.5 release is one we are immensely proud of. It certainly caused a stir in the community, even if it was just about the dress sense (or lack thereof?) of some of our developers. Read the release accouncement.
